common.unsavedChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes. Do you really want to close without saving?

validation.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}.
validation.urlAlreadyExists: This URL has already been added
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.createDescription: Create a new calendar to organize your shifts
calendar.selectDescription: Choose a calendar to manage your shifts
calendar.name: Calendar Name
calendar.deleteWarning: All shifts, presets and notes will also be deleted.
calendar.selectToCompareDescription: Choose 2-3 calendars to view them side by side
calendar.mobileNotOptimized: The comparison view is not optimized for mobile. Please use a larger screen for the best experience.
calendar.noSharedCalendars: No calendars shared with you yet

color.customDescription: Choose a custom color using the color picker

note.placeholder: e.g., Early shift because appointment in the afternoon...
note.hintMobile: To add or edit a note or event, long press on a day in the calendar.
note.hintDesktop: To add or edit a note or event, right-click on a day in the calendar.
note.recurringEditWarning: This is a recurring event. Changes will affect all occurrences.

shift.createDescription: Add a new shift to your calendar
shift.noShiftsInMonthDescription: Add shifts by clicking on days in the calendar above.

preset.manageDescription: Edit or delete your shift presets
preset.createFirstDescription: Create your first preset to quickly add shifts to your calendar. Presets save your frequently used shift times and details.
preset.deleteConfirm: Delete this preset? This will also delete all shifts created from this preset.
preset.hideFromStatsHint: Exclude shifts from this preset from statistics
preset.cannotAddPresetHint: This preset belongs to a different calendar and cannot be added here.

view.settingsDescription: Customize how shifts are displayed in all calendars
view.shiftsPerDayHint: Maximum number of regular shifts to display per day
view.externalShiftsPerDayHint: Maximum number of external calendar shifts to display per day
view.combinedSortHint: Sort regular and external shifts together instead of separately
view.showNotesHint: Display shift notes in calendar grid
view.showFullTitlesHint: Display complete shift titles without truncation
view.highlightWeekendsHint: Highlight Saturdays and Sundays with color

stats.title: Shift Statistics
stats.radarDescription: Compare top shift types by total hours and average

onboarding.description: Create your first calendar to manage your shifts.

guestEmptyState.title: No Public Calendars Available
guestEmptyState.description: There are currently no public calendars shared. Please log in to create and manage your own calendars.

externalSync.manageDescription: Add and manage multiple external calendars for this calendar
externalSync.importMethodUrlHint: External calendar URL (iCloud, Google, or other ICS URLs)
externalSync.displayModeHint: Choose how synced shifts should be displayed in the calendar
externalSync.colorHint: Choose the color for all imported shifts
externalSync.hideFromStatsHint: Exclude shifts from this calendar from statistics
externalSync.deleteConfirm: Delete this external calendar? All imported shifts will be removed.
externalSync.hintsDescription: Select your calendar type to see instructions:
externalSync.urlHintCustom: Paste the URL of your ICS calendar (webcal:// or https://)
externalSync.hintICloud: Open iCloud.com → Calendar → Click the share icon next to your calendar → Enable 'Public Calendar' → Copy the webcal:// URL and paste it here.
externalSync.hintGoogle: Open Google Calendar → Settings → Select your calendar → Scroll to 'Secret address in iCal format' → Copy the URL and paste it here.
externalSync.hintCustom: Any publicly accessible ICS calendar will work. The URL must start with https:// or webcal:// and end with .ics. Example: https://example.com/calendar.ics
externalSync.autoSyncHint: Choose how often this calendar should automatically sync

syncNotifications.title: Sync Notifications
syncNotifications.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all sync logs?

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: All release notes and changes of BetterShift

export.title: Export Calendar
export.description: Export your calendar as an ICS or PDF file
export.icsHint: Export as ICS file to import into other calendar apps (Apple Calendar, Google Calendar, Outlook, etc.)
export.pdfHint: Export as PDF document for printing or sharing
export.multiCalendarHint: Combine shifts from multiple calendars into one export file
export.selectCalendarsDescription: Choose which calendars to include in the export
export.selectedCount: {count, plural, =0 {No calendars selected} =1 {1 calendar selected} other {# calendars selected}}
export.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one calendar

auth.loginDescription: Sign in with your account or use one of the providers below
auth.registerDescription: Create a new account to get started
auth.profileDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences
auth.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
auth.dangerZoneDescription: Irreversible actions that affect your account
auth.logoutDescription: Sign out from your current session
auth.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all data
auth.editProfileDescription: Update your name, email, and profile picture
auth.avatarHint: Max 5MB. Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP
auth.invalidImageType: Invalid file type. Please select an image.
auth.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
auth.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
auth.registrationDisabledDescription: New user registration is currently disabled. Please contact an administrator if you need an account.
auth.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already in use
auth.activeSessionsDescription: Manage your logged-in devices and sessions

system.unavailableDescription: The system is currently unavailable due to a critical error. Please try again later or contact an administrator.
system.unavailableRetry: Please refresh this page to try again or check back later.

guest.bannerMessage: You are viewing this calendar as a guest. Sign in for full access.
guest.cannotEdit: You cannot edit in read-only mode

share.addUserDescription: Search for a user to share this calendar with
share.noSharesDescription: Share this calendar with other users to collaborate
share.userSharesDescription: Manage who can access this calendar
share.publicAccessDescription: Control public access for authenticated and guest users
share.publicPermissionNoneDesc: No one can access this calendar without being explicitly shared
share.publicPermissionReadDesc: Any authenticated user can view the calendar
share.publicPermissionWriteDesc: Any authenticated user can view and edit the calendar
share.removeShareConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to remove access for {user}? They will no longer be able to view or edit this calendar.

token.accessLinksDescription: Share this calendar via secure links
token.noTokensDescription: Create a share link to give other users access
token.revokeConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to revoke "{name}"? Anyone using this link will immediately lose access.
token.linkCreatedDescription: Your share link has been created successfully
token.saveWarning: Save this link now - it won't be shown again!
token.shareInfo: Anyone with this link can access your calendar with the specified permission level
token.createLinkDescription: Create a shareable link to give others access to this calendar

rateLimit.title: Too Many Requests
rateLimit.fallback: Please wait a moment before trying again.

activityLog.description: View your account activity and security events
activityLog.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all activity logs? This cannot be undone.

admin.dashboardDescription: Welcome to the BetterShift Admin Panel
admin.orphanedCalendarsWarningDescription: {count, plural, =1 {There is 1 calendar without an owner} other {There are # calendars without an owner}}. Please assign them to users.
admin.recentActivityDescription: Latest admin- and security-related activity logs
admin.banWarning: User will be logged out immediately and cannot sign in until unbanned.
admin.banReasonPlaceholder: Enter the reason for banning this user...
admin.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete all calendars, shifts, notes, and shares owned by this user.
admin.deleteUnderstood: I understand this action cannot be undone
admin.deleteConfirmationHint: Type the exact username to confirm deletion
admin.passwordResetWarning: No email will be sent. You must manually inform the user of their new password.
admin.passwordResetSecurityNote: This password will be saved immediately. Copy it before closing this dialog.
admin.roleChangeWarning: Changing a user's role will affect their permissions immediately

calendars.title: Calendar Management
calendars.description: Manage all calendars in the system
calendars.selectedCount: {count, plural, =1 {1 calendar selected} other {# calendars selected}}
calendars.orphanedWarning: {count, plural, =1 {1 orphaned calendar} other {# orphaned calendars}} need owner assignment
calendars.orphanedWarningDescription: Please assign these calendars to users or delete them.
calendars.guestPermissionHint: Controls public access to this calendar
calendars.transferMultipleDescription: {count, plural, =1 {1 calendar} other {# calendars}} will be transferred
calendars.searchUserHint: Type at least 2 characters to search

calendars.deleteUnderstood: I understand this action cannot be undone

calendars.calendarsTransferred: {count, plural, =1 {1 calendar transferred} other {# calendars transferred}}

admin.deleteLogsDescription: Delete audit logs older than a specific date. This action cannot be undone.
admin.deleteLogsBeforeHint: All logs before this date will be permanently deleted
admin.deleteLogsWarning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All audit logs before the selected date will be deleted from the database.
admin.confirmPermanentDeletion: I understand that audit logs will be permanently deleted
admin.willDeleteLogsOlderThan: All logs older than {date} will be deleted
admin.deleteSelectedLogsDescription: Delete {count, plural, one {# selected log} other {# selected logs}}. This action cannot be undone.
admin.willDeleteSelectedLogs: {count, plural, one {# log} other {# logs}} will be permanently deleted
